title: Organophosphate esters uptake, translocation and accumulation in rice (Oryza sativa L.): impacts of lipid transporters and chemical properties
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00132J, Paper
Wenxuan Wang, Haiou Wang, Xiaoyu Ren, Wenxiao Zhang, Qian Li
Biological and chemical factors exhibit tissue specificity in OPE accumulation. OsTIL and OsLTPL1 played a dominant role in OPE uptake and accumulation. OPE translocation involved OsMLP mediated-vertical transport in the vascular system.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
